fields.summary: [VZ_ CHR2FA][WebUI][Trial Box][AP] [Ethernet backhaul] Random devices appear in the list of devices without an IP address

fields.Expected Result: DUT goes OFF and ON again. Manual reboot triggered.

fields.Action: Check the services status after the reboot.
fields.Expected Result:
After reboot, all services are still up and running:
Wan is UP and access is OK from LAN
The IPTV should continue to play
The Wi-Fi client should connect automatically

 

*If WiFi Bridge connection supported:
Connection of the WiFi bridges shall be re-established. Clients connected behind the wifi bridges shall be able to contact LAN devices and access the WAN

fields.Action: Check the modified settings mentioned in the preconditions.
fields.Expected Result:
The modified parameters are Boot persistent.
	- LAN device icon & Name modified.
	- Wifi SSID, Secrity mode and Key modified.
	- NAT/PAT rule created.
	- DynDNS account available and Synced.

fields.description:
Reboot of the DUT using the button

[Precondition]

DUT is up and all services are UP: IPTV is running,  there is at least 2xclient connected to Wi-Fi.
Make some configuration on DUT:
 - LAN device icon & Name modified.
 - WLAN STAs connected to each Band. (2.4GHz and 5GHz)
 - Wifi SSID, Secrity mode and Key modified.
 - NAT/PAT rule created.
 - DynDNS account added and Synced.

For WiFi Bridges support and availability:
 - Two WiFi Bridges connected in repeater and extender modes with their WiFi Guest module ENABLED.; Clients available and connected at 2.4GHz wifi bridge (repeater mode) and 5GHz wifi bridge (extender mode) and also on the WiFi Guest of the WiFi bridges
Note:; WiFi bridges shall stay connected (and if possible with clients connected behind them) through the complete execution of the test campaign
fields.summary: [Interfaces] Reboot using HW Button

security.description: Only SoftAtHome people can access the issue
